name: Maui Wowie Shrimp
author: ROXIEMAUI
summary: Easy recipe to put together for that laid-back 'Maui Wowie' person. Great for the beach or backyard BBQ. You will be surprised by the onolicious flavor. This dish always gets the Shaka sign!
ingredients: 2 pounds uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste
¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Preheat outdoor grill for medium heat, and lightly oil the grate
Season both sides of shrimp with garlic salt and black pepper; if using cayenne, see Cook's Note
Generously coat both sides of shrimp with mayonnaise
Cook shrimp on heated grill until shrimp are bright pink on the outside and opaque on the inside, and the mayonnaise turns golden brown, 5 to 10 minutes on each side
